critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of urgency and determination in combating drug abuse. It highlights the threat posed by drug abuse and emphasizes the need for improved law enforcement activities. The order likely intends to evoke fear regarding the consequences of drug abuse and a sense of hope through the establishment of an office dedicated to combating it. Disgust may be conveyed towards drug abuse. Joy and surprise are unlikely to be emotions the president wants to convey.
